EmailTemplate.description: Application denied email for no-FICO customers, Amp
EmailTemplate.name: Credit Denied - No FICO product - Amp
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry, we were unable to approve your application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear %%Send Bills Contact: First Name%%,
Thank you for your recent community solar application - unfortunately we're unable to approve your application at this time for one of the following reasons:
1) You have less than 1,000 kWh in annual electricity use 2) You have less than 3 months of usage history 3) Your account is listed as demand rate and/or has over 25kw DC in demand
We're sorry we're unable to approve your application at this time, but we're happy to revisit your application once the above criteria has been met.
Thank you for considering Amp powered by BlueWave, we hope to be able to serve you in the future.
- Amp powered by BlueWave
BlueWave Customer Care 844.786.4100 | customercare@bluewavesolar.com
